result.name: Phenotypic and genotypic characterization of Sudanese goat breeds
result.description: The aim of this project is to assess the genetic variation that is characterized Sudanese goat breeds in the milk whey protein genes (LALBA and BLG). Four Sudanese goat breeds were screened for variability in LALBA and BLG genes at the DNA level by comparative sequencing of five animals per breed.
result.center: Animal Breeding Biology and Molecular Genetics, Humboldt University of Berlin
